name: Bad Pixel Simulator
description:
Pixel Art Go Brrr

This is my first game so dont regret downloading it after reading this. 

Arrow keys or your joystick to move. z,x,c,Space (Y,X,A,B) to do stuff. ( Press z/Y after everything cause its gonna break your head)

Available for Windows And Linux ( Wow This sounds so professional, I hope noone sues me for this after reviewing the absolute qwaleetee of this game)
